creator: People Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Marwari Sangam – India’s Most Preferred Family Matchmaking Service to find Marwari brides & grooms.

Marriage in India is about families & communities - not just two individuals. Marwari Sangam has been created from ground up keeping this reality in mind.

With more than 2 million profiles, Marwari Sangam is fast emerging as the preferred matchmaking service for Indian families globally.

In addition to the features provided by other matrimonial services like -

- free registration,
- verified matches, and,
- privacy controls

with Marwari Sangam you can -

- view detailed family information,
- conduct reference checks, and,
- connect with matches instantly on WhatsApp

So, register today and join thousands of others who have found their life partner on Marwari Sangam. Apart from English, Marwari Sangam can be used in हिंदी, मराठी, தமிழ், తెలుగు, ಕನ್ನಡ, മലയാളം, বাংলা, ગુજરાતી and ਪੰਜਾਬੀ

The Marwari Sangam app is easy to use and available in your preferred language or mother tongue.

You can search for brides/grooms from various Indian cities like Mumbai, New Delhi, Bengaluru (Bangalore), Chennai, Hyderabad, Ahmedabad, Kolkata, Surat, Pune, Jaipur, Lucknow, Kanpur, Nagpur, Visakhapatnam, Indore, Ludhiana or Patna.

Apart from Marwari Sangam, we have many other community matrimonial apps that represent other communities such as kokanastha, adidravida, agarwal, kshatriya, agri, arora, aryavysya, baidya, baishnab, baishya, balija, banik, baniya, barujibi, besta, bhandari, bhovi, billava, nayak, brahmin, barendra, bhumihar, danua, deshastha, gour, saraswat, halua, and many more.

Our array of community-specific matrimonial apps also cater to various religions like Hindus, Muslims, Jains, Buddhists, Sikhs, Christians, etc.
